poem:
Title: "In Tribute to a Mind's Voyager"

Amid the forest of cognition, Andy roamed,
Crafting paths in thought where none existed.
In torrents of fear, he taught us to wade,
Tracing the velvet hands of wisdom upon our dread.
In silence now, his echoes dance,
Kuczmierczyk: psychologist, poet, our lantern in darkness,
In each existence touched, he eternally lives.
Professor, Coach, Bard - your song continues to give.
